text: Brevity is the best recommendation of speech, whether in a senator or an orator.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: We should often feel ashamed of our best actions if the world could see all the motives which produced them.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: We should often blush for our very best actions, if the world did but see all the motives upon which they were done.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
author: Wilson Mizner

text: I love that for Barack, there is no such thing as 'us' and 'them' - he doesn't care whether you're a Democrat, a Republican, or none of the above... he knows that we all love our country... and he's always ready to listen to good ideas... he's always looking for the very best in everyone he meets.
author: Michelle Obama
